mapper.select: SELECT C.CT_NAME AS CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER C INNER JOIN TBL_CST M ON C.CT_CODE IN (M.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1, M.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2, M.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3) WHERE M.CS_MEMBER_CODE = #{csMemberCode}

SELECT Q.*, M.CS_NAME AS QST_WRITER_NAME, COALESCE(C1.CT_NAME, '연동되지 않음') AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME1, COALESCE(C2.CT_NAME, '연동되지 않음') AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME2, COALESCE(C3.CT_NAME, '연동되지 않음') AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME3 FROM TBL_QUESTION Q INNER JOIN TBL_CST M ON Q.QS_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE = M.CS_MEMBER_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CENTER C1 ON M.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1 = C1.CT_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CENTER C2 ON M.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2 = C2.CT_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CENTER C3 ON M.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3 = C3.CT_CODE WHERE M.CS_MEMBER_CODE = #{csMemberCode}
SELECT Q.*, M.CS_NAME AS QST_WRITER_NAME FROM TBL_QUESTION Q INNER JOIN TBL_CST M ON Q.QS_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE = M.CS_MEMBER_CODE ORDER BY Q.QS_REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_QUESTION VALUES(nextval('seq_question'), #{qsTitle}, #{qsContent},#{qsWriterMemberCode}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,false)
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_QUESTION SET QS_TITLE=#{qsTitle}, QS_CONTENT=#{qsContent}, QS_MODIFIED_DATE=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE QS_NUMBER=#{qsNumber}

SELECT M.CS_NAME FROM TBL_CST M JOIN TBL_QUESTION Q ON M.CS_MEMBER_CODE = Q.QS_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE
